mapper.select: SELECT exam_id ,author_id ,create_at ,modify_at ,year ,semester ,term ,name ,professor ,grade ,major ,content FROM exam WHERE exam_id = #{examId}

SELECT exam_id ,author_id ,create_at ,modify_at ,year ,semester ,term ,name ,professor ,grade ,major ,content FROM exam WHERE year = #{year} | name = #{name} | professor = #{professor} limit #{page}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into exam (author_id, create_at, modify_at, year, major, grade, semester, term, name, professor, content) value (#{authorId}, now(), now(), #{year}, #{major}, #{grade}, #{semester}, #{term}, #{name}, #{professor}, #{content})
